title: Lend Us Your Aid (6U9)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert Gimli twice to make him and each Elf companion strength +3 until the regroup phase.
Lore:	“He hewed a two-handed stroke and laid the last Orc before his feet. 'Now my count passes Master Legolas again.'”
Rarity:	U
